availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Catherine Bingman. Father of Ezra Bingman, Amy Bingman, Hannah A. Bingman, Dennis Bingman, Eli Bingman, Abram Bingman, Taylor J. Bingman, and Rachel J. Bingman. Farmer in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Penn Township, p. 139B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Penn Township, p. 426.
"Jacob Bingman (1812-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #59929716, accessed October 7, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59929716/.
